en.title: Pay your application fee
en.paragraph2: . Your application will not be submitted until you have paid.
en.line2: You will need a valid debit or credit card. If you cannot pay now, save the application and return to it when you are ready.
en.paragraph4: . You may be able to get help paying the fee if you:
en.reason2: have a little saving or no saving or
en.hwfTextOption: I need help paying the fee
en.hwfReferenceNumberText: I already have a help with fees reference number

paymentError.title: There is a problem
paymentError.defaultPaymentError: Your application is not submitted. Please try again
paymentError.applicationNotSubmitted: Your payment was successful but you need to resubmit your application. If you are unable to submit the application, please contact the court with the case reference number {caseId}
paymentError.paymentUnsuccessful: Your payment was unsuccessful. Make the payment again and resubmit your application

hwfPaymentSelection.required: Please select if you need help paying the fee

helpWithFeesReferenceNumber.required: Please enter your help with fees reference number

cy.title: Talu’r ffi gwneud cais
cy.paragraph1: Y ffi am gais am ysgariad yw £
cy.paragraph2: . Ni fydd eich cais yn cael ei gyflwyno hyd nes y byddwch wedi talu amdano.
cy.line2: Bydd arnoch angen cerdyd debyd neu gerdyn credyd dilys. Os na allwch dalu nawr, dylech gadw’r cais a dychwelyd ato pan fyddwch yn barod.
cy.paragraph4: . Mae’n bosibl y gallwch gael help i dalu’r ffi os ydych:
cy.payAndSubmitButton: yn talu ac yn cyflwyno eich cais
cy.reason2: heb lawer o gynilion neu ddim o gwbl neu
